traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.detail: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.detail: You are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form.

actions.name: Song of Pain
actions.detail: Each creature within 20' of the keledone must make a [dc-primary] WIS save or take 27 (6d8) psychic damage (half damage on save). Any creature that fails by 5 or more additionally becomes blinded (save ends).

actions.name: Song of Sleep
actions.detail: Each creature within 20' of the keledone must make a [dc-secondary] WIS save or fall unconscious for one minute, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to wake it.
